7.title: What Happened Next
7.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: Musicool culminated with a live performance of Cinderella airing on T4. The show was reworked in a modern day setting, featuring songs such as Hard to Beat (Hard-Fi), Genie in a Bottle (Christina Aguilera) and I Predict a Riot (Kaiser Chiefs). The final show took place at the UCL Bloomsbury Theatre in London at 12 noon on Sunday 6 May 2007 in front of an audience of friends and family of cast members, plus T4 competition winners and was broadcast live on Channel 4.
imdb.title: Musicool
plot: A UK-based reality TV show. The show aims to write and produce a West End production.::wik

_Musicool_ (qv) culminated with a live performance of Cinderella airing on T4. The show was reworked in a modern day setting, featuring songs such as Hard to Beat (Hard-Fi), Genie in a Bottle (Christina Aguilera) and I Predict a Riot (Kaiser Chiefs). The final show took place at the UCL Bloomsbury Theatre in London at 12 noon on Sunday 6 May 2007 in front of an audience of friends and family of cast members, plus T4 competition winners and was broadcast live on Channel 4.::wik
